name: Gazebo
longDes: You are in a gazebo on the rear grounds of the mansion. There is a peculiar scent here - the aroma of roses hangs on the breeze here, but there is another smell, earthy and somewhat rotten. The gazebo is a pristine white, but there is a middle ^plank# on floor where the finish seems worn. To the $West# are the rose gardens.
shortDes: You are standing in the gazebo overlooking the rose gardens. There is a sweet and sour smell on the air here, like something good has turned. One floor ^plank# appears off-color. To the $West# are the rose gardens.

features.name: plank
features.preActionDes: Looking closer, the gazebo has a plank that looks off-color towards the center.
features.inActionDes: You pry up the plank, revealing a dark hole!
features.postActionDes: You took the plank from this spot revealing a dark hole! I wonder what's down there.
